entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning then becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023
